many personalizations, too,
of people saying what kind

1390.text:
and their difficulties and
what it's like to be out

1393.text: or to be closeted or whatever.

1395.text:
So I do think it has grown
my awareness and hopefully

1399.text:
my compassion and
made me a better ally.

1404.text:
KEVIN VLK: Thank you, guys,
so much for being here.

1415.text:
KEVIN VLK: So "Freeheld"
is out right now.

1418.text: So thank you, guys, so much.
